title: Patch Notes
content: me clipping and stretching issues with the Emblazoned Plate of the Marshal. Fixed one of the tendrils of the jester hat vibrating ominously when worn by female dragonborn characters. Also fixed all the tendrils standing up stiffly when worn by dwarves. Fixed Popper's loincloth clipping into his thigh.
